title: Designing Effective Mathematics Instructional Methods Through Analysis of Trends in Instructional Design Research

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical knowledge and understanding of fundamental instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Course for learners composed of pre-service/in-service teachers to analyze instructional design trends in smartphone-based environments and learn effective mathematics teaching methodology design

learning_goals: Learners analyze instructional design research trends to distinguish effective and ineffective research cases
Learners apply comparative research methodologies to evaluate the strengths and weaknesses of various mathematics teaching methods
Learners develop practical mathematics instructional designs applicable within constraints (smartphone environments)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
